name: Fable Tapestry
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Races © 2015, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text:
This spell is available to members of a specific ethinicity of nomadic people.

The spell weaves shadows and colors from your family scarf into the shape of legendary characters from your people's folktales. This spell functions as shadow conjuration emulating summon monster I, except as noted here. You can summon only one copy of the same character at the same time, even with multiple castings of this spell. The shadow creatures are 40% real and are drawn from the list below.

  • Freelance thief
  • Fey giant toad
  • Con artist
  • Carousing champion
  • Evasive slip
  • Bearded devil
components_zh: 语言，姿势，器材（你的卡佩尼亚）
effect_zh: 一个传奇角色/4施法者等级
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则不相信
text_zh: 这种法术会将你的卡佩尼亚（kapenia）上的阴影和色彩编织成瓦瑞西亚（Varisian）民俗传说中的传奇人物。 这个法术如同模仿召唤怪物I（summon monster I）的幽影咒法术（shadow conjuration），除非另有说明。你只能同时召唤同一角色的一个副本，即使多次施展此法术。幽影生物的真实度为40%，从下面的列表中选取。 译注：卡佩尼亚为一种瓦瑞西亚人的家谱大方巾，被它们的主人当做衣物，首饰，工具，甚至是武器，是很多瓦里西亚家族的无价祖传宝贝，往往见证过某支瓦里西亚血脉延绵数世纪的历史。
